name: Squid Game (itch) (mrpeanutbelly)
description:
Squid Game.. the videogame!

Based on the popular Netflix show "Squid Game". This multiplayer version only includes the first game "Red Light, Green Light". 

This version of Red Light, Green Light is more akin to a battle royale. The first player to finish wins! But they should do so before the timer runs out!

Since only the first player wins, other players can attempt to push eachother in order to sabotage or just  have faster reflexes!

You can set your name in the pause menu (Escape button, P button or "pause" button).

Enjoy and have fun!

We're  Gannbu now ..
